subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Darren Law was one of nine drivers to break Homestead-Miami Speedway’s track record for Daytona Prototype sports cars, as he captured the pole for the Grand Prix of Miami.
snippet: Darren Law was one of nine drivers to break Homestead-Miami Speedway’s track record for Daytona Prototype sports cars, as he captured the pole for the Grand Prix of Miami.
